entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
